languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, смиренно прошу вас об аудиенции. Проктор Антар вмешивается в работу экипажа и требует архивные записи о беглых преступниках, полученные от Имперского Флота. Вопрос безотлагательный... если вам будет угодно, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость, смиренно прошу вас об аудиенции. Проктор Антар вмешивается в работу экипажа и требует архивные записи о беглых преступниках, полученные от Имперского Флота. Вопрос безотлагательный... если вам будет угодно, Лорд-капитан".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, I humbly request an audience with you. Proctor Anthar is interfering with the crew and is demanding to see all the archival records of fugitive criminals we have ever received from the Imperial Navy. The matter is urgent... if you please, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, смиренно прошу вас об аудиенции. Проктор Антар вмешивается в работу экипажа и требует архивные записи о беглых преступниках, полученные от Имперского Флота. Вопрос безотлагательный... если вам будет угодно, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I humbly request an audience with you. Proctor Anthar is interfering with the crew and is demanding archival records of fugitive criminals from the Imperial Navy. The matter is urgent... if you please, Lord Captain."

"Lord Captain, I humbly request an audience with you. Proctor Anthar is interfering with the crew and is demanding archival records of fugitive criminals from the Imperial Navy. The matter is urgent... if you please, Lord Captain."

"Lord Captain, I humbly request an audience with you. Proctor Anthar is interfering with the crew and is demanding archival records of fugitive criminals from the Imperial Navy. The matter is urgent... if you please, Lord Captain."

"Lord Captain, I humbly request an audience with you. Proctor Anthar is interfering with the crew and is demanding to see all the archival records of fugitive criminals we have ever received from the Imperial Navy. The matter is urgent... if you please, Lord Captain."

"Lord Captain, I humbly request an audience with you. Proctor Anthar is interfering with the crew and is demanding to see all the archival records of fugitive criminals we have ever received from the Imperial Navy. The matter is urgent... if you please, Lord Captain."

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、謹んで面会をお願い申し上げます。アンサール代理人がクルーの業務に干渉し、これまで帝国海軍から受け取った全ての逃亡犯罪者に関する記録を閲覧させろと要求しています。事態は急を要します…お願いします、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I humbly request an audience with you. Proctor Anthar is interfering with the crew and is demanding to see all the archival records of fugitive criminals we have ever received from the Imperial Navy. The matter is urgent... if you please, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、謹んで面会をお願い申し上げます。アンサール代理人がクルーの業務に干渉し、これまで帝国海軍から受け取った全ての逃亡犯罪者に関する記録を閲覧させろと要求しています。事態は急を要します…お願いします、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, izninizle sizinle görüşmek isterim. Üsteğmen Anthar, mürettebatın işlerine müdahale ediyor ve İmparatorluk Donanması'ndan almış olduğumuz kaçak suçlulara dair arşiv kayıtlarını görmek istiyor. Lütfen Lord Kaptan... Mesele acil."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I humbly request an audience with you. Proctor Anthar is interfering with the crew and is demanding to see all the archival records of fugitive criminals we have ever received from the Imperial Navy. The matter is urgent... if you please, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, izninizle sizinle görüşmek isterim. Üsteğmen Anthar, mürettebatın işlerine müdahale ediyor ve İmparatorluk Donanması'ndan almış olduğumuz kaçak suçlulara dair arşiv kayıtlarını görmek istiyor. Lütfen, Lord Kaptan... Mesele acil."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, solicito humildemente una audiencia. El Procurador Anthar está interfiriendo con la tripulación y exige ver todos los registros archivados de criminales fugados que hemos recibido de la Armada Imperial. Es un asunto urgente... por favor, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I humbly request an audience with you. Proctor Anthar is interfering with the crew and is demanding to see all the archival records of fugitive criminals we have ever received from the Imperial Navy. The matter is urgent... if you please, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, solicito humildemente una audiencia. El Procurador Anthar está interfiriendo con la tripulación y exige ver todos los registros archivados de criminales fugados que hemos recibido de la Armada Imperial. Es un asunto urgente... por favor, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: “舰长大人，我谦卑地请求与您见面。安萨监察官正在干扰船员，要求查看我们从帝国海军那里收到的所有逃犯的档案记录。目前的情况很紧急……不知您能否处理一下，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I humbly request an audience with you. Proctor Anthar is interfering with the crew and is demanding to see all the archival records of fugitive criminals we have ever received from the Imperial Navy. The matter is urgent... if you please, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我谦卑地请求与您见面。安萨监察官正在干扰船员，要求查看我们从帝国海军那里收到的所有逃犯的档案记录。目前的情况很紧急……不知您能否处理一下，舰长大人。”

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je demande humblement à ce que vous me receviez en audience. Le proctor Anthar empoisonne l'équipage et exige de consulter tous les dossiers relatifs aux criminels en fuite que nous avons reçus de la Marine Impériale. Sauf votre respect... il y a urgence. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I humbly request an audience with you. Proctor Anthar is interfering with the crew and is demanding to see all the archival records of fugitive criminals we have ever received from the Imperial Navy. The matter is urgent... if you please, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je demande humblement à ce que vous me receviez en audience. Le proctor Anthar empoisonne l'équipage et exige de consulter tous les dossiers relatifs aux criminels en fuite que nous avons reçus de la Marine Impériale. Sauf votre respect... il y a urgence. »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ich bitte demütig um eine Audienz. Proktor Anthar verlangt von der Crew Einsicht in alle archivierten Aufzeichnungen über flüchtige Kriminelle, wie wir jemals von der imperialen Kriegsflotte erhalten haben. Die Angelegenheit ist dringend ... wenn es Euch beliebt, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I humbly request an audience with you. Proctor Anthar is interfering with the crew and is demanding to see all the archival records of fugitive criminals we have ever received from the Imperial Navy. The matter is urgent... if you please, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ich bitte demütig um eine Audienz. Proktor Anthar verlangt von der Crew Einsicht in alle archivierten Aufzeichnungen über flüchtige Kriminelle, wie wir jemals von der imperialen Kriegsflotte erhalten haben. Die Angelegenheit ist dringend ... wenn es Euch beliebt, Lord Captain."
